titles.title: Capital Reinvestment Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to temporarily exclude long-term capital gain from the gross income of individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/29/2003--Introduced. Capital Reinvestment Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude long-term capital gain from gross income for the taxable years beginning in 2002, 2003, and 2004.
